titleStmt.title: Battering rams against New Rome containing a farther discovery of the grand hypocrisie of the leaders and teachers of the people called Quakers : together with a publick challenge to meet G. Fox, G. Whitehead, W. Penn, and S. Cater to prove matters of fact : to which are added some queries propounded to their Protestant hearers who are not of G.F.'s party / by Francis Bugg.
titleStmt.author: Bugg, Francis, 1640-1724?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
